post.author: tracker1
post.title: AnkhSVN 2.0 Available
post.content: Not sure how this snuck by me without notice, but the 2.0 release of Ankh SVN is out, and pretty much rocks.  It's now an SCC adapter, instead of a VS Plugin.  This means better VS integration.  Not to mention Diff and Merge now works as you would expect.  Worth the upgrade, uninstall your old version first.
